name: Wraith Escape
description:
My first ever Game Maker project, following a lot of different tutorials, I learned a lot in the process and I'm happy with how it turned out, I hope to make more ambitious projects in the future.

This game is a short, extremely fast paced platform shooter game where you have to shoot the 3 spheres in every level to move on to the next, but your body is unstable in this weather, so you only have a few seconds to shoot the next sphere before you have to try again.
